comment: Very easy to understand her lectures. Makes college algebra a breeze to study.

this professor is amazing. it was my second time taking this course since my first (different) professor didnt teach a thing and solely relied on ALEKS. professor Derenzo held class every week and clearly explained the topics in a way i could finally understand. shes also very sweet and truly cares about your success. ONLY TAKE HER!!

To be fair, I'm not good at math, but I thought this class was really hard. Attendance isn't mandatory. She records the tests and quizzes, and I feel like ALEKS never prepared me for the test, and ALEKS was pretty much my only resource. She was very nice though and always answered my emails and questions, but as an online prof, maybe not the best.

Uses ALEKS, an easy program to help with math. I wish the high schools had this math program. Goes step by step when you need help with a problem and gives you an infinite # of example problems if you need it. TAKE HER! Super sweet teacher.

She doesn't teach, she uses a program called ALEKS. The homework took me hours to do every week. The tests are all free-response and she uses a lockdown browser with a camera. There are 4 tests and each of them is about 18% of your grade. The plus side is that she will use your final to drop your lowest test grade. Not an easy A but manageable
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Im horrible at math but she was really helpful about the things I didnt understand and very attentive. A lot of homework though and theyre back to back. Easy class for someone who remembers algebra 1 in high school!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Do not take the hybrid for her. There is no break on the homework and its a pain on the butt because of ALEKS.

She's a really sweet lady, but unless youre already good at it, this isn't your class. I dont know if its because of the hybrid class, but she assigns so much frickin work. You never have a break, and only four tests make up your grade. The math work is almost overwhelming at times. I wont take her class again.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: Shes the best professor Ive had so far! Im horrible at math and she made it so easy. I honestly didnt go to many of the lectures. She gave us an option to go to another night she was teaching the same class. She was so caring understanding and flexible with us. I thought I would get a C but I got a high A!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: She is really a great professor. She drops off your lowest test grade with your final grade if it helps your grade grow. she also drops off your lowest H.W. grade and also give extra credits in tests. For me it was an Easy A. Just Show up to lectures and you will pass with an Easy A. I would Def take her again!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I have never been good at math, but I have finally done good because of this professor!! She goes slow so you understand. Attendance is a grade, but tests/HW online. She really cares for her students and gives partial credit on tests. Do not take any other Algebra teacher than Professor Derenzo!! You'll thank me later. SHE makes it an easy earned A

Do not take her for hybrid! She does not give extra credit and since we meet once a week, she speeds through material. She gives partial credit on tests if you give her your scratch work but other than that you have to work for your grade.

I took a hybrid Monday nights at 8pm, so it would not be good if you arent already like alright at college algebra because it is hard to stay awake because she is soft spoken. Very nice tho, will grade your scratch work to get you extra points on tests, enough homework that tests wont define your grade.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: It might be due to taking the hybrid version of college algebra, however I would not recommend that class or Mrs. Derenzo to anyone about to take college algebra unless you are already strong at math. The class moves at an extremely quick pace and your grade is based off 4 tests in the class. I managed to get a b but she barely taught and only read

Professor Derenzo is one of the best math teachers I have ever had. I am good at math, but havent done much for about 9 years. She goes at a slower pace and really focuses on helping those who need it. If youve ever had trouble with math, this is the person who can help you understand it better. She honestly made math so much fun.
Class was only once a week but she covered relevant material. I have always struggled in math but she made it much easier and helped me get a better grade than I thought I was going to end with.

I am horrible at math. This was my second time taking this class and she made it very easy to understand. She explains things clearly and is always open to questions. You don't need to buy the book and there is no homework. Definitely recommend, especially if you struggle with math.

Professor Derenzo wants all of her students to succeed. The class moves at quite a slow pace, but its important to remember that some people who are taking this class havent taken a math class in years. She never gets frustrated and always answers peoples questions. Do the online practice tests! They are so similar to the actual tests.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: She can power through things so if you have questions, ask. Very nice and has a great sense of humor.

I am not very good at math, but she made everything very easy to understand. She moves at a slower pace and makes sure that everyone understands what is going on. She lets us use a cheat sheet on the 4 tests and Final. There is one quiz and we don't come in for class for it. The class is super easy  and I would highly recommend!!!
Mrs. Derenzo is a good teacher but the tests are super hard.

She is an amazing teacher & she is soo kind. She will answer any questions that you have during & after class. 4 tests & 1 quiz & you can have a cheat sheet for all of them. No homework & there are many practice tests on mymathlab. The final is cumilative & it will replace your lowest grade in the class. TAKE HER! You will not regret it!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: I'm horrible at math, she honestly made it a lot more enjoyable. If I could take her for every single math class I'm required to take I definitely would. I usually just barley pass math and with her I made a B which says a lot. Take her!

She is AMAZING! So patient and cares about her students. If you aren't going to be in class or you're going to be late, she makes sure she spends the extra time for you to understand anything she just taught in the class. She uploads all of the problems she goes over in class, her email is always open for questions.

Glynnis Derenzo is an amazing teacher! She cares about her students and understands that not everybody likes math or is ever going to use it later in life. She allows plenty of notes (3 pages) for tests, and homework is optional. If you aren't confident in math, she will work with you individually to help you succeed. Final replaces lowest test!
She is an amazing professor. I would definitely take her again.  Homework are optional.

Only four tests, and the final replaces lowest test grade. She is a great teacher, and answers any questions she can, as fast as she can. Gives partial credit. Took for hybrid math 1111, and I actually enjoyed math for the first time in years. No mandatory homework.. optional

Mrs Derenzo is an excellent teacher. She is very clear on the subject matter and she will let you explain how you came to an answer if it is different from her method. I could have probably made an A or B f I would have showed up for the classes and studied more, but this is in no way her fault. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND HER!
Awesome Professor! Glad to help you. Easy A!!

Easy class.  Attend regularly and take notes. MyMathLab helps SO MUCH if you miss a class, because the examples work out step-by-step problems.  5 tests and a final, final replaces lowest test grade.  Her tests are exactly like the practice tests on MyMathLab.  If you can do the practice test & get an A, you'll ace the tests. Do the HW when posted.

This class was super easy. If you have a basic understanding of algebra you'll be fine. The first like 3 chapters are all review from stuff you learned in high school and even then it doesn't get too much more difficult. Now quizzes, one test a chapter, a final at the end and homework. Just do your homework, ask if you have questions, and study.

Professor DeRenzo is very nice and quite helpful. She is willing and able to teach those who need additional help. It is a math class, so you must pay attention and do the homework. However, she replaces your lowest grade with the final and practice versions of the tests are available online around a week in advance. I highly recommend her!

I have been a remedial math student my whole life, and in her class I got an A! I am now taking her again for 0098 and recommend her for any student, especially if Math is not your best subject.  She is awesome!!
